scripts.debug-note: To debug, use npm run debug{0,1,2}.
scripts.debug1: nodemon -e js -w . -w js tsdsfe.js --debugtoconsole all --checkdeps false --checkservers false
scripts.debug2: nodemon -e js -w . -w js tsdsfe.js --debugtoconsole all --startdeps false
scripts.preinstall: npm install nodemon; cd deps; make bin/pngquant; cd ../../tsdsdd; npm install; cd ../autoplot/; make install; make stop; make start
